docs.snippet: Investigators said Thursday they were following new leads in the robbery and shooting of two hikers at a popular Northern California trailhead that left a 69-year-old Massachusetts man dead and his 76-year-old friend in critical condition....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investigators said Thursday they were following new leads in the robbery and shooting of two hikers at a popular Northern California trailhead that left a 69-year-old Massachusetts man dead and his 76-year-old friend in critical condition.

headline.main: Police Seek Man Who Shot Hikers on California Trail

docs.snippet: Janet L. Yellen, chairwoman of the Federal Reserve, told the graduates that her predecessor, Ben Bernanke, did not let setbacks during the financial crisis deter his effort to revive the economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Janet L. Yellen, chairwoman of the Federal Reserve, told the graduates that her predecessor, Ben Bernanke, did not let setbacks during the financial crisis deter his effort to revive the economy.
docs.abstract: Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen tells New York University graduates in commencement speech at Yankee Stadium that finding the right path in life involves missteps; Yellen cites example of Ben Bernanke, her predecessor, and praises his actions during the financial crisis.

headline.main: Yellen Tells N.Y.U. Graduates to Expect Failure and Learn From It
headline.print_headline: Yellen Tells N.Y.U. Graduates to Expect Failure and Learn From It

docs.snippet: The suspects included two police officers, two registered nurses, a paramedic, an au pair and an individual who served as both a den master with the Boy Scouts of America and a Little League baseball coach....
docs.lead_paragraph: The suspects included two police officers, two registered nurses, a paramedic, an au pair and an individual who served as both a den master with the Boy Scouts of America and a Little League baseball coach.
docs.abstract: Dept of Homeland Security investigation leads to arrest of 71 people in New York City area on charges of possessing, producing or distributing child pornography using peer-to-peer file sharing program; suspects represent broad spectrum of professions, including two registered nurses, two police officers, paramedic, Brooklyn rabbi and airline pilot.

headline.main: 71 Are Accused in a Child Pornography Case, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: 71 Are Accused in a Child Pornography Case, Officials Say

docs.snippet: The Rangers have no captain at the moment, with the job vacant since Ryan Callahan was traded in March, but they have enjoyed a rousing playoff run....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Rangers have no captain at the moment, with the job vacant since Ryan Callahan was traded in March, but they have enjoyed a rousing playoff run.
docs.abstract: New York Rangers are two victories away from making the Stanley Cup finals, despite not having a team captain; job was left vacant after forward Ryan Callahan was traded in March.

headline.seo: Rangers Surge Through N.H.L. Playoffs Without a Captain

docs.snippet: A growing number of high school students have discovered an alternative route to college through fringe sports like rugby....
docs.lead_paragraph: A growing number of high school students have discovered an alternative route to college through fringe sports like rugby.
docs.abstract: Growing number of high school students have discovered an alternative route to college through fringe sports like rugby; more than 180 collegiate rugby clubs have started in the last four years, creating more financial aid opportunities; roughly 100 women and 75 men across the country, including many minorities, received rugby scholarships in 2013.
